description: Create JSON Schema for ///LOCAL_TASKS format with all required fields and atomic criteria validation
constraints: Required fields: id, title, description, files_touched, est_lines_changed, test_command, assigned_to, priority, status
priority enum: P0, P1, P2, P3
status enum: open, in_progress, review, done, blocked, failed
Include optional: parent_id, inputs, outputs, constraints (array), needs_context (array), invariant_test (object)
needs_context items have: path (string), lines_start (integer), lines_end (integer)
invariant_test has: target (string), assertions (array of strings)
